sessions.title: Streamlining Onsite Registration: From Kiosks to Mobile Check-In
sessions.description: Learn how modern registration technology is transforming the attendee experience. Discover best practices for reducing wait times, improving data accuracy, and creating seamless check-in flows using kiosks, mobile apps, and self-service solutions.
speakers: Sarah Mitchell, VP of Event Solutions, Choose 2 Rent

sessions.title: The Death of Plastic Badges: Sustainable Solutions for 2025
sessions.description: Explore eco-friendly alternatives to traditional plastic badges. From biodegradable materials to digital badges, learn how to reduce your event's environmental impact while maintaining professional standards.

sessions.title: RFID & UHF Technology: The Future of Attendee Tracking
sessions.description: Discover how RFID and UHF technology enables real-time attendee tracking, session analytics, and personalized experiences. See live demonstrations of the latest hardware and learn implementation best practices.
speakers: Sarah Mitchell, VP of Event Solutions, Choose 2 Rent

sessions.title: Reducing Wait Times: Self-Service Check-In Strategies
sessions.description: Practical strategies for implementing self-service check-in that attendees love. Learn about kiosk placement, user interface design, backup procedures, and staff training for smooth operations.
speakers: Tom Hughes, Product Manager, Lineup Ninja

sessions.title: From Random Encounters to Intentional Connections: AI-Powered Networking
sessions.description: Transform your networking experience with AI-powered matchmaking. Learn how machine learning algorithms create meaningful connections based on interests, goals, and professional backgrounds.

sessions.title: Peer-to-Peer Learning: Creating Knowledge-Sharing Communities
sessions.description: Discover how Braindate's crowdsourced knowledge platform enables attendees to become teachers and learners. See how peer-to-peer sessions drive deeper engagement and create lasting professional relationships.
speakers: Jennifer Walsh, Chief Experience Officer, Braindate

sessions.title: Live Q&A Done Right: Engaging Hybrid Audiences
sessions.description: Master the art of inclusive Q&A sessions that engage both in-person and virtual attendees. Learn about moderation strategies, AI-powered translation, and real-time polling to keep everyone involved.

sessions.title: Gamification & ROI: Measuring Sponsor Engagement
sessions.description: Learn how gamification drives attendee engagement while delivering measurable ROI for sponsors. Explore interactive content strategies, loyalty programs, and data capture techniques.

sessions.title: Speed Networking 2.0: Quality Over Quantity
sessions.description: Reimagine speed networking with structured formats that create meaningful connections. Learn how to facilitate productive conversations, track interactions, and provide follow-up tools.

sessions.title: AI in Events: Beyond the Hype
sessions.description: Separate AI fact from fiction in the events industry. Explore practical applications of artificial intelligence in registration, networking, content delivery, and analytics with real-world case studies.
speakers: Simon Crawford, Head of Innovation, Erleah

sessions.title: Mobile-First Event Experiences
sessions.description: Design event experiences that put mobile at the center. Learn from Eventbase's work with Olympics, SXSW, and CES on creating apps that attendees actually use.
speakers: Patricia Moore, VP of Product, Eventbase

sessions.title: The Rise of Extended Reality: Virtual Production Studios
sessions.description: Explore how XR technology and virtual production studios are creating immersive event experiences. See live demonstrations of LED walls, real-time rendering, and mixed reality applications.

sessions.title: Event Tech Integration: Making Your Stack Work Together
sessions.description: Stop fighting with incompatible systems. Learn integration strategies, API best practices, and middleware solutions that make your event tech stack work seamlessly together.

sessions.title: Breaking Language Barriers: Real-Time Translation Technology
sessions.description: Make your events truly global with real-time translation and interpretation. Learn about AI-powered translation, human interpretation services, and hybrid approaches for 6000+ language combinations.
speakers: Dr. Elena Rodriguez, Head of Language Services, TransPerfect Live

sessions.title: Live Captioning: Legal Requirements and Best Practices
sessions.description: Navigate accessibility regulations while providing excellent captioning services. Understand ADA compliance, WCAG guidelines, and the technology that makes real-time captioning possible.

sessions.title: Designing Accessible Hybrid Experiences
sessions.description: Create hybrid events that work for everyone, regardless of ability or location. Learn universal design principles, assistive technology integration, and inclusive content delivery strategies.
speakers: Dr. Elena Rodriguez, Head of Language Services, TransPerfect Live

sessions.title: Measuring Event Carbon Footprint: Tools and Strategies
sessions.description: Learn how to calculate, track, and reduce your event's environmental impact. Explore carbon calculators, offset programs, and sustainable vendor selection criteria.
speakers: Marcus Brown, Sustainability Director, One Tribe

sessions.title: The Business Case for Sustainable Events
sessions.description: Sustainability isn't just good ethicsâ€”it's good business. Discover how sustainable practices reduce costs, attract attendees, and differentiate your events in a competitive market.
speakers: Marcus Brown, Sustainability Director, One Tribe

sessions.title: Tech Rental vs. Purchase: The Environmental Impact
sessions.description: Compare the carbon footprint of purchasing versus renting event technology. Learn how equipment rental reduces e-waste and supports circular economy principles.
speakers: Sarah Mitchell, VP of Event Solutions, Choose 2 Rent
Nina Patel, Regional Manager, One World Rental

sessions.title: Capturing and Monetizing Event Content
sessions.description: Transform your event content into revenue streams. Learn video production strategies, content licensing, and on-demand platforms that extend event value beyond the live experience.
speakers: Sophie Martin, Account Director, First Sight Media

sessions.title: Facial Recognition for Photo Distribution: Privacy and Possibilities
sessions.description: Explore AI-powered photo distribution that respects privacy. Learn about consent management, data protection, and the technology that matches attendees with their event photos automatically.

sessions.title: Live Streaming Best Practices for Global Audiences
sessions.description: Deliver professional-quality live streams to audiences worldwide. Cover encoding, CDN selection, multi-platform distribution, and engagement strategies for virtual attendees.
speakers: Sophie Martin, Account Director, First Sight Media

sessions.title: Conference Programme Management: From Chaos to Control
sessions.description: Streamline speaker management and agenda planning with smart scheduling tools. Learn about auto-clash detection, speaker communication workflows, and last-minute change management.
speakers: Tom Hughes, Product Manager, Lineup Ninja

sessions.title: AV Excellence on Any Budget
sessions.description: Deliver professional AV experiences without breaking the bank. Learn equipment selection, vendor negotiation, and creative solutions for small to mid-sized events.
speakers: Chris Taylor, AV Specialist, Novum Live

sessions.title: Event WiFi: Ensuring Connectivity for 1000+ Attendees
sessions.description: Plan and deploy robust WiFi networks that handle high-density crowds. Learn about bandwidth requirements, access point placement, and troubleshooting strategies.
speakers: Nina Patel, Regional Manager, One World Rental

sessions.title: Lead Intelligence: Turning Scans into Sales
sessions.description: Help exhibitors convert badge scans into revenue. Learn lead scoring, qualification workflows, CRM integration, and ROI measurement that proves event value to sponsors.

sessions.title: Measuring Event ROI: Beyond Attendance Numbers
sessions.description: Define and track metrics that matter. Explore engagement scores, content consumption, network value, and other KPIs that demonstrate true event impact to stakeholders.

sessions.title: Attendee Data Privacy in 2025: GDPR and Beyond
sessions.description: Navigate the complex landscape of data privacy regulations. Learn GDPR compliance, consent management, data retention policies, and emerging privacy laws globally.

sessions.title: The Hybrid Playbook: Engaging Online and In-Person Audiences Simultaneously
sessions.description: Master the art of hybrid events that deliver value to both physical and virtual attendees. Learn production techniques, engagement strategies, and technology integration for seamless experiences.

sessions.title: Virtual Events That Don't Suck: Lessons from 1000+ Webinars
sessions.description: Create virtual events that attendees actually enjoy. Learn from Cvent's extensive experience with engagement tactics, platform selection, and content formats that work in virtual environments.
